description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Cauliflower Mac 'N' Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gluten-Free Cauliflower Mac 'N' Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place sauce and pasta mixture in an ovenproof dish, mixing to combine. Top with cauliflower crumb mixture, then bake for 15 minutes or until topping is golden. Serve sprinkled with parsley.
